| Part     | Description |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                | Description                           |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `--indicator-color` | The color of the spinner's indicator. |
| `--stroke-width`    | The width of the indicator.           |
| `--track-color`     | The color of the spinner's track.     |
